trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for entity templates.
Entity templates are user controls that apply to an entity (a table) instead of to a single data field, as with field templates.
trans-unit.target: 实体模板与字段模板是适用于 （一个表） 而不是对实体的单个数据字段，用户控件。

trans-unit.source: An entity template typically contains several <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl> controls for rendering data fields.
trans-unit.target: 实体模板通常包含若干<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl>用于呈现数据字段的控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the data-bound control that contains this entity template.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含此实体模板的数据绑定控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type that contains the template.

The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl.ContainerType%2A> class provides information about the context (the control type) in which the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl> class is contained.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl.ContainerType%2A>类提供了有关上下文 （控件类型） 的信息，在其中<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl>包含类。

trans-unit.source: This type can be a list control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类型可以是一个列表控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: It can also be a single-item control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以是一个单项控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the behavior of an application depending on the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl.ContainerType%2A> value, such as conditionally displaying or hiding specific UI elements.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义的具体取决于应用程序的行为<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.EntityTemplateUserControl.ContainerType%2A>值，如有条件地显示或隐藏特定 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data-rendering mode for the entity.
trans-unit.target: 获取实体的数据呈现模式。

trans-unit.source: The data-rendering mode for the entity.
Gets the table that the entity template applies to.
trans-unit.target: 获取实体模板所应用的表。

trans-unit.source: The table that the entity template applies to.
Gets the validation to apply to the entity control group.
trans-unit.target: 获取要应用于实体控件组的验证。

trans-unit.source: The validation to apply to the entity control group.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于实体控件组的验证。
